author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Gameplay Release Date Trailer for Hell Clock, an action RPG dungeon crawler for Rogue Snail. Players will fight through dungeons and unleash inhuman powers in a dark fantasy twist on Brazil’s War of Canudos. Hell Clock is launching on June 18 for PC (Steam) with a demo available now.

#HellClock #Gaming #IGN
title: Hell Clock - Official Gameplay Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom has been out since 2023, and while it never received major DLC, that doesn’t mean nothing has changed. In this video, we break down everything new added to the game since launch — from small patches that fixed bugs and glitches to the notable performance and feature upgrades in the new Nintendo Switch 2 edition.
We also dive into Zelda Notes, the new companion app launching alongside the Switch 2 version of the game. From voiced navigation and stat tracking to QR code sharing for Autobuilds and new story-based Voice Memories, it’s the closest thing to post-launch content we’ve gotten.
If you’re thinking about returning to Hyrule or just want to know what’s different before jumping in on Switch 2, this video covers everything you need to know.

Timecodes
0:00 - Intro
0:34 - No Major DLC
1:07 - Minor Patches - v.1.1.0 to v.1.2.1
1:43 - Nintendo Switch 2 Version
4:24 - Outro
title: Tears of the Kingdom: Everything New Added Since Launch (The Legend of Zelda)

author: IGN
description:
It’s been nearly a decade since The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild launched alongside the Nintendo Switch, and in that time, the game has seen a ton of updates, DLCs, and content expansions. Whether you're a longtime fan or diving back in for the Nintendo Switch 2 rerelease, this video breaks down everything that’s been added to Breath of the Wild since launch.

In this video, we cover:
The full Expansion Pass, including Master Trials & The Champions’ Ballad
New features like Hero’s Path Mode and Master Mode
Crossover items from Xenoblade Chronicles 2
Minor patches, bug fixes, and performance updates
Amiibo functionality & exclusive items
What’s new in the Switch 2 version: better performance, graphics, Zelda Notes app, and more

Timecodes
0:00 - Intro
0:49 - Breath of the Wild Expansion Pass
2:25 - Xenoblade Chronicles 2 Crossover
2:55 - Minor Patches - v.1.1.0 to v.1.5.0
3:40 - Amiibo Champion Figures
4:20 - Nintendo Switch 2 Version
6:34 - Outro
title: Breath of the Wild: Everything New Added Since Launch (The Legend of Zelda)

author: IGN
description:
When a 10-year-old girl’s sketchbook takes a dip in a mysterious forest pond, her comically imaginative drawings spring to life, and they’re not exactly friendly. As these scribbled monsters wreak havoc, it’s up to her family to come together, face the madness, and somehow save the day.

#Sketch #Movies #IGN
title: Sketch  - Official Trailer #2 (2025) Tony Hale, D'arcy Carden

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Console Release Date Announcement for Somber Echoes, a 2D action-adventure platformer developed by Rock Point Games and Lav Games. Players will make use of God-given powers to save the universe from her maniacal twin sister. Explore the lands of Atromitos, acquire upgrades, and slay enemies along the way. Somber Echoes is launching on July 8 for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and Xbox Series X|S, with the game being available now for PC (Steam).

#SomberEchoes #Gaming #IGN
title: Somber Echoes - Official Console Release Date Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In this episode of Developers React to Speedruns on IGN, the team behind the Turok: Dinosaur Hunter Remaster from Nightdive Studios sits down to watch speedrunner Catmanthecat blaze through their game in just 28 minutes.

Joining the commentary are Samuel Villarreal, Lead Engine Developer, Leo Mikkola, Former Project Manager, and Eric Serio, Senior Developer. As Catmanthecat pulls off wild skips and game-breaking tricks, the devs provide real-time insights, technical breakdowns, and honest reactions to how their remaster is being pushed to its absolute limits.

Whether you're a speedrun enthusiast, a game dev fan, or just here for the dinosaurs, this behind-the-scenes look at how Turok gets torn apart is something you won’t want to miss.
title: Turok Remastered Developers React to 28-Minute Speedrun

author: IGN
description:
Fantasy Life i: The Girl Who Steals Time reviewed by Travis Northup on PlayStation 5, also available on PC and Nintendo Switch.

Fantasy Life i: The Girl Who Steals Time expertly combines easygoing life sim mechanics with light action-adventure RPG goodness, resulting in one of my favorite cozy games in a long time. Whether it’s the compelling job grind while hanging around town, building your own community, or the more action-packed exploration and combat, I found myself continually surprised by what this adventure threw at me the longer I played. I was happily sinking hours into chopping down trees and picking flowers, and got oddly invested in its goofy but compelling story. As far as having your time stolen goes, you could do a whole lot worse than Fantasy Life i.

#FantasyLifeITheGirlWhoStealsTime #Review #IGN
title: Fantasy Life i: The Girl Who Steals Time Review

author: IGN
description: Elden Ring Nightreign is an entirely different Elden Beast than the base game, and if you don't know how to engage with its unique roguelite rules, it will take a lot of bad runs before you start to consistently get good ones. To help avoid some of those pitfalls new players fall into, here are 12 essential tips to help make your Nightreign journey just a little bit smoother.
title: Elden Ring Nightreign - 12 Essential Tips You Need to Know

author: IGN
description:
Welcome back to Next-Gen Console Watch! This week, Logan is on a very special assignment, so it's just Daemon, Max, and Ryan. The topic: their biggest hopes and deepest fears for the Nintendo Switch 2. We're hoping the Switch 2 can maintain momentum with third-parties, especially considering the Switch 2 is closer in parity to the other current-gen consoles, than the Switch 1 was to the PS4 and Xbox One. And we're all worried that everyone Switch owners biggest fear could return: Joy-Con drift. We also ahve last week's poll results, and a new poll for you to vote on at IGN.com.

And don't forget to buy tickets to IGN Live happening in Downtown Los Angeles next week, June 7-8. Go to https://www.ign.com/live/ for the full schedule, and use promo code NGCWGUEST for one free ticket!
title: Nintendo Switch 2: Our Hopes and Fears - Next-Gen Console Watch

author: IGN
description:
Having trouble defeating Serpenphare, the AP-draining, lightning-weak optional boss in Clair Obscur: Expedition 33? This guide has everything you need—from where to find Serpenphare, to the best party setup, recommended Lumina and weapons, and detailed breakdowns of its attack patterns and mechanics.

Timecodes
0:00 - Intro
0:22 - SPOILER WARNING (Finish Act 2 First)
0:35 - Where to Find Serpenphare
0:59 - Recommended Party Setup
2:37 - Serpenphare's Moveset
6:15 - Rewards and Outro
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 - Serpenphare Boss Guide | How to Beat the Flying Serpent
